alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 11:30AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is expected to continue. * WHERE...Souris River near Westhope. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1414.0 feet, Water is almost valley-wide. The area flooded is grass covered and no buildings are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1414.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around minor flood stage of 1414.0 feet through the next few days. - Flood stage is 1414.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1414.3 feet on 07/13/1954. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
